title: Grigoleti Lake
about: Grigoleti Lake is located on the territory of the Grigoleti resort, Lanchkhuti Municipality, Guria, quite close to the sea coast. The shores of the lake are covered with aquatic plants. It is surrounded by fields and forests, creating a wonderful environment for a picnic. Fishing enthusiasts often visit the lake. Grigoleti Lake is one of the wonderful places to relax and unwind in nature.
